issue.title: [Python] Explicitly opt in to HDFS unit tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-557](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-557). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be a better developer experience to opt-in to the HDFS tests. e.g.

`py.test pyarrow --hdfs`
